SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT P.PAYMENT_DATE, G.CALL_TYPE, M.USER_ID, M2.USER_NAME, D.CAR_NO, G.FROM_WHERE, G.TO_WHERE, P.PAID_AMOUNT, P.PAY_METHOD FROM PAYMENT P, GEN_CALL G, MEMBER M, MEMBER M2, DRIVER D, CALL_DOG CD, DOG D2 WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND G.CALL_NO = CD.CALL_NO AND D2.USER_ID = M.USER_ID AND M2.USER_NO = D.USER_NO AND P.MERCHANT_UID = G.MERCHANT_UID AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
M.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
P.PAYMENT_DATE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE ) ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT ROWNUM, PAYMENT_DATE, CALL_TYPE, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CAR_NO, FROM_WHERE, TO_WHERE, PAID_AMOUNT, PAY_METHOD FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT P.PAYMENT_DATE, G.CALL_TYPE, M.USER_ID, M2.USER_NAME, D.CAR_NO, G.FROM_WHERE, G.TO_WHERE, P.PAID_AMOUNT, P.PAY_METHOD FROM PAYMENT P, GEN_CALL G, MEMBER M, MEMBER M2, DRIVER D, CALL_DOG CD, DOG D2 WHERE P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND G.CALL_NO = CD.CALL_NO AND D2.USER_ID = M.USER_ID AND M2.USER_NO = D.USER_NO AND P.MERCHANT_UID = G.MERCHANT_UID AND P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE )
AND USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND PAYMENT_DATE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY ROWNUM
